sentence: Expect most of those locally who have been endorsed by Trump to be in attendance, though it's only certain that two others are speaking U.S. Rep. Lisa McClain, R-Bruce Township, who represents the area where the rally is being held, and John Gibbs, a former Trump administration official who is running for the Republican nomination against U.S. Rep. Peter Meijer, R-Grand Rapids, who also voted to impeach Trump.
author: Todd Spangler
title: Donald Trump rally in Michigan on Saturday, April 2: Everything you need to know
Opinion: Trump-endorsed candidates are having trouble fundraising. That's a bad sign for the former president.

sentence: Freshman Rep. Peter Meijer of Michigan, another Trump target, raised $530,000, which far outpaced the $51,000 that his Trump-backed challenger John Gibbs raised after entering the race in early November.
title: Liz Cheney and other Trump targets trounce his endorsees in the fundraising race

sentence: Also voting to impeach was U.S. Rep. Peter Meijer, R-Grand Rapids, who is running for reelection this year despite Trump's endorsement of another candidate, John Gibbs.
author: Todd Spangler
title: Rep. Fred Upton announces retirement from Congress, has been in US House since 1987

sentence: Another endorsee has big tech ties: John Gibbs is running in Michigan after a career in Silicon Valley.
author: Ben Werschkul
title: Business resumes of J.D. Vance and other Trump-backed candidates

sentence: Michigan Rep. Peter Meijer raised $553,000, compared to the $123,000 raised by opponent John Gibbs, a former acting assistant secretary in the Department of Housing and Urban Development in the Trump administration.
author: Herb Jackson
title: Trump targets outraise challengers, unlike some other incumbents

title: Daily Kos Elections Live Digest: 4/22
